# Gradient card

The `.gradient-card` and `.gradient-card-content` classes contain a predefined gradient border, default border radius and padding. Gradient cards are used to bring attention to the card content.

## Usage

Here is an example of a standard usage of gradient card component.

```html
<div class="gradient-card">
	<div class="gradient-card-content">
		<p>Gradient card default</p>
	</div>
</div>
```

## Gradient card with title

You can add a title to the gradient card with an optional icon.
